comment.author: 60480032@N04
comment._content: Marion Geraldine Hogan Ingram (1919-1995)  was a private meteorologist and the president of Weather Services, Inc. in Boston, Massachusetts. She appeared in several editions of Who's Who of American Women (1958/59, 1961/62 and 1964/65) - I don't have access those at the moment (nor have I been able find an obit online so far) or I would try to fill in some other details.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Marisa-

This is really exciting! Thank you so much for the lead, and potential misspellings, which I'm passing along to our archivists now! We'll keep you all posted on anything else we find out about Hogan Ingram.

Best,
Catherine Shteynberg
Smithsonian Institution Archives
